text: Haman 13.34 Mt 25.14, Lu 12.36-38 aba hɨve lamalama ciaŋ mu nɨman abamalɨ. Mɨkiŋ nɨbu kulaŋ mu nudɨ ulaŋ agadɨ vala udaŋ aba nudɨ salaku hɨsɨŋ kulemɨlɨ agɨlasaŋ ibi igu salaku hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ vivi saŋ abavi haman me uamalɨ. Kulaŋ hɨbɨ ivɨ ivɨ agadɨ migɨla migɨlaŋ hɨnivi agadɨ sikɨvica migɨla migɨla saŋ abavi haman me uamalɨ.
